list.name: WATCHTOWER
list.description: Grom ejects a Watchtower from his Grom Bomb that gives all allies sight into bushes over a large area. The watchtower slowly loses health over time.
list.descriptionHtml: Grom ejects a Watchtower from his Grom Bomb that gives all allies sight into bushes over a large area. The watchtower slowly loses health over time.

list.name: RADIO-CHECK
list.description: Grom's next attack throws x Buds in rapid succession.
list.descriptionHtml: Grom's next attack throws x Buds in rapid succession.
